fields.description: The size of the RedisEnterprise cluster. Defaults to 2 or 3 depending on SKU. Valid values are (2, 4, 6, ...) for Enterprise SKUs and (3, 9, 15, ...) for Flash SKUs.
fields.name: Capacity

fields.description: The type of RedisEnterprise cluster to deploy. Possible values: (Enterprise_E10, EnterpriseFlash_F300 etc.)
fields.name: Name
